function _calculateSlippageTolerance(\n        uint256 startTime,\n        uint256 currentTime,\n        uint256 minSlippageTolerance,\n        uint256 maxSlippageTolerance\n    ) internal pure returns (uint256) {\n        if (currentTime <= startTime) {\n            return minSlippageTolerance;\n        }\n\n        uint256 elapsed = (currentTime - startTime) * 1e4 / _AUCTION_DURATION;\n\n        if (elapsed > 1e4) {\n            return maxSlippageTolerance;\n        }\n\n        return (minSlippageTolerance + elapsed * (maxSlippageTolerance - minSlippageTolerance) / 1e4);\n    }\n\n    function _calculateSlippageToleranceByPrice(\n        uint256 price1,\n        uint256 price2,\n        uint256 minSlippageTolerance,\n        uint256 maxSlippageTolerance\n    ) internal pure returns (uint256) {\n        if (price2 <= price1) {\n            return minSlippageTolerance;\n        }\n\n        uint256 ratio = (price2 * 1e4 / price1 - 1e4);\n\n        if (ratio > _AUCTION_RANGE) {\n            return maxSlippageTolerance;\n        }\n\n        return (minSlippageTolerance + ratio * (maxSlippageTolerance - minSlippageTolerance) / _AUCTION_RANGE);\n    }\n\n    function _verifyOrder(ResolvedOrder memory order) internal {\n        order.validate();\n\n        _permit2.permitWitnessTransferFrom(\n            order.toPermit(),\n            order.transferDetails(address(this)),\n            order.info.trader,\n            order.hash,\n            GammaOrderLib.PERMIT2_ORDER_TYPE,\n            order.sig\n        );\n    }\n}\n","keccak256":"0xe62e48d85b8d7ed83934e157a40d3860e42267e70045d055d383d44ca4cfeba6","license":"UNLICENSED"},"src/markets/spot/SpotOrder.sol":{"content":"// SPDX-License-Identifier: UNLICENSED\npragma solidity ^0.8.17;\n\nimport {OrderInfo, OrderInfoLib} from \"../../libraries/orders/OrderInfoLib.sol\";\nimport {ResolvedOrder} from \"../../libraries/orders/ResolvedOrder.sol\";\n\nstruct SpotOrder {\n    OrderInfo info;\n    address quoteToken;\n    address baseToken;\n    int256 baseTokenAmount;\n    uint256 quoteTokenAmount;\n    address validatorAddress;\n    bytes validationData;\n}\n\n/// @notice helpers for handling predict order objects\nlibrary SpotOrderLib {\n    using OrderInfoLib for OrderInfo;\n\n    bytes internal constant SPOT_ORDER_TYPE = abi.encodePacked(\n        \"SpotOrder(\",\n        \"OrderInfo info,\",\n        \"address quoteToken,\",\n        \"address baseToken,\",\n        \"int256 baseTokenAmount,\",\n        \"uint256 quoteTokenAmount,\",\n        \"address validatorAddress,\",\n        \"bytes validationData)\"\n    );\n\n    bytes internal constant ORDER_TYPE = abi.encodePacked(SPOT_ORDER_TYPE, OrderInfoLib.ORDER_INFO_TYPE);\n    bytes32 internal constant SPOT_ORDER_TYPE_HASH = keccak256(ORDER_TYPE);\n\n    string internal constant TOKEN_PERMISSIONS_TYPE = \"TokenPermissions(address token,uint256 amount)\";\n\n    /// @dev Note that sub-structs have to be defined in alphabetical order in the EIP-712 spec\n    string internal constant PERMIT2_ORDER_TYPE = string(\n        abi.encodePacked(\"SpotOrder witness)\", OrderInfoLib.ORDER_INFO_TYPE, SPOT_ORDER_TYPE, TOKEN_PERMISSIONS_TYPE)\n    );\n\n    /// @notice hash the given order\n    /// @param order the order to hash\n    /// @return the eip-712 order hash\n    function hash(SpotOrder memory order) internal pure returns (bytes32) {\n        return keccak256(\n            abi.encode(\n                SPOT_ORDER_TYPE_HASH,\n                order.info.hash(),\n                order.quoteToken,\n                order.baseToken,\n                order.baseTokenAmount,\n                order.quoteTokenAmount,\n                order.validatorAddress,\n                keccak256(order.validationData)\n            )\n        );\n    }\n\n    function resolve(SpotOrder memory spotOrder, bytes memory sig) internal pure returns (ResolvedOrder memory) {\n        uint256 amount;\n        address token;\n\n        if (spotOrder.baseTokenAmount > 0) {\n            token = spotOrder.quoteToken;\n            amount = spotOrder.quoteTokenAmount;\n        } else {\n            token = spotOrder.baseToken;\n            amount = uint256(-spotOrder.baseTokenAmount);\n        }\n\n        return ResolvedOrder(spotOrder.info, token, amount, hash(spotOrder), sig);\n    }\n}\n","keccak256":"0x266f634c38ce1aa95ffe70c9e16cb1ecb8fb3edb1faf35ca6d51440ac2883b69","license":"UNLICENSED"},"src/types/GlobalData.sol":{"content":"// SPDX-License-Identifier: UNLICENSED\npragma solidity ^0.8.17;\n\nimport {SafeTransferLib} from \"lib/solmate/src/utils/SafeTransferLib.sol\";\nimport {ERC20} from \"lib/solmate/src/tokens/ERC20.sol\";\nimport \"../interfaces/IPredyPool.sol\";\nimport {IHooks} from \"../interfaces/IHooks.sol\";\nimport \"../libraries/DataType.sol\";\nimport \"./LockData.sol\";\n\nlibrary GlobalDataLibrary {\n    using SafeTransferLib for ERC20;\n\n    struct GlobalData {\n        uint256 pairsCount;\n        uint256 vaultCount;\n        address uniswapFactory;\n        mapping(uint256 => DataType.PairStatus) pairs;\n        mapping(uint256 => DataType.RebalanceFeeGrowthCache) rebalanceFeeGrowthCache;\n        mapping(uint256 => DataType.Vault) vaults;\n        LockDataLibrary.LockData lockData;\n    }\n\n    function validateVaultId(GlobalDataLibrary.GlobalData storage globalData, uint256 vaultId) internal view {\n        if (vaultId <= 0 || globalData.vaultCount <= vaultId) revert IPredyPool.InvalidPairId();\n    }\n\n    function validate(GlobalDataLibrary.GlobalData storage globalData, uint256 pairId) internal view {\n        if (pairId <= 0 || globalData.pairsCount <= pairId) revert IPredyPool.InvalidPairId();\n    }\n\n    /// @notice Initializes lock for token settlement\n    function initializeLock(GlobalDataLibrary.GlobalData storage globalData, uint256 pairId) internal {\n        if (globalData.lockData.locker != address(0)) {\n            revert IPredyPool.LockedBy(globalData.lockData.locker);\n        }\n\n        globalData.lockData.quoteReserve = ERC20(globalData.pairs[pairId].quotePool.token).balanceOf(address(this));\n        globalData.lockData.baseReserve = ERC20(globalData.pairs[pairId].basePool.token).balanceOf(address(this));\n        globalData.lockData.locker = msg.sender;\n        globalData.lockData.pairId = pairId;\n    }\n\n    function callSettlementCallback(\n        GlobalDataLibrary.GlobalData storage globalData,\n        bytes memory settlementData,\n        int256 deltaBaseAmount\n    ) internal {\n        uint256 pairId = globalData.lockData.pairId;\n\n        IHooks(msg.sender).predySettlementCallback(\n            globalData.pairs[pairId].quotePool.token,\n            globalData.pairs[pairId].basePool.token,\n            settlementData,\n            deltaBaseAmount\n        );\n    }\n\n    /// @notice Finalizes lock\n    function finalizeLock(GlobalDataLibrary.GlobalData storage globalData)\n        internal\n        returns (int256 paidQuote, int256 paidBase)\n    {\n        paidQuote = settle(globalData, true);\n        paidBase = settle(globalData, false);\n\n        delete globalData.lockData;\n    }\n\n    function take(GlobalDataLibrary.GlobalData storage globalData, bool isQuoteAsset, address to, uint256 amount)\n        internal\n    {\n        DataType.PairStatus memory pairStatus = globalData.pairs[globalData.lockData.pairId];\n\n        address currency;\n\n        if (isQuoteAsset) {\n            currency = pairStatus.quotePool.token;\n        } else {\n            currency = pairStatus.basePool.token;\n        }\n\n        ERC20(currency).safeTransfer(to, amount);\n    }\n\n    function settle(GlobalDataLibrary.GlobalData storage globalData, bool isQuoteAsset)\n        internal\n        returns (int256 paid)\n    {\n        address currency;\n        uint256 reservesBefore;\n\n        if (isQuoteAsset) {\n            currency = globalData.pairs[globalData.lockData.pairId].quotePool.token;\n            reservesBefore = globalData.lockData.quoteReserve;\n        } else {\n            currency = globalData.pairs[globalData.lockData.pairId].basePool.token;\n            reservesBefore = globalData.lockData.baseReserve;\n        }\n\n        uint256 reserveAfter = ERC20(currency).balanceOf(address(this));\n\n        if (isQuoteAsset) {\n            globalData.lockData.quoteReserve = reserveAfter;\n        } else {\n            globalData.lockData.baseReserve = reserveAfter;\n        }\n\n        // TODO: safe cast\n        paid = int256(reserveAfter) - int256(reservesBefore);\n    }\n}\n","keccak256":"0x8faac71d8105ce8b706b83822199ab999e163201e42c7aa935bbbbb5af3a7145","license":"UNLICENSED"},"src/types/LockData.sol":{"content":"// SPDX-License-Identifier: UNLICENSED\npragma solidity ^0.8.17;\n\nimport \"../interfaces/IPredyPool.sol\";\n\nlibrary LockDataLibrary {\n    struct LockData {\n        address locker;\n        uint256 quoteReserve;\n        uint256 }\n}\n","keccak256":"0x7d964c64996a4297fc3692473f291eb595e9ecbe5a2922437f6d82f52a3339c4","license":"UNLICENSED"},"src/vendors/AggregatorV3Interface.sol":{"content":"// SPDX-License-Identifier:
